statements: SELECT * FROM extraction_and_transformation;
SELECT data_source, data_type FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_type = 'CSV';
SELECT data_source, extraction_method FROM extraction_and_transformation ORDER BY extraction_method DESC;
SELECT data_type, transformation_query FROM extraction_and_transformation LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_source = 'Database' OR data_source = 'API';
SELECT * FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_type = 'Customer';
SELECT data_source, extraction_method FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE extraction_method LIKE '%API%';
SELECT * FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_type != 'Invoice' ORDER BY data_type DESC, data_source;
SELECT data_type, COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM extraction_and_transformation GROUP BY data_type HAVING total_rows > 1;
SELECT data_source, extraction_method FROM extraction_and_transformation WHERE data_source IN ('Database', 'API') ORDER BY extraction_method;
SELECT * FROM extraction_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM extraction_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM extraction_sources WHERE source_type='API';
SELECT * FROM data_transformations ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT transformation_name, transformation_query FROM data_transformations WHERE extraction_source_id=1;
SELECT * FROM extraction_sources WHERE source_type = 'Database';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM extraction_sources WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM data_transformations WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT transformation_name FROM data_transformations WHERE transformation_query LIKE '%SELECT%';
SELECT source_name, source_type, source_url FROM extraction_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM extraction_source;
SELECT id, source_name, source_type FROM extraction_source WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_name, source_location FROM extraction_source WHERE source_type = 'API';
SELECT * FROM data_transformation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT transformation_type, transformation_status FROM data_transformation WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM extraction_source;
SELECT id, source_name, source_location FROM extraction_source WHERE source_type = 'Database';
SELECT id, source_name, extraction_frequency FROM extraction_source ORDER BY extraction_frequency ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_transformation WHERE transformation_status = 'Active' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_frequency, report_destination FROM reporting_config WHERE report_status = 'Published';
SELECT * FROM extraction_sources;
SELECT source_id, source_name FROM extraction_sources ORDER BY source_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_id FROM extraction_sources WHERE source_id = 2;
SELECT transformation_id, transformation_name, transformation_type FROM data_transformation;
SELECT * FROM reporting_data WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM extraction_sources ORDER BY source_id DESC;
SELECT source_name, source_id FROM extraction_sources WHERE source_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reporting_data WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT transformation_name FROM data_transformation ORDER BY transformation_id;
SELECT report_name, transformation_name FROM reporting_data JOIN data_transformation ON reporting_data.transformation_id = data_transformation.transformation_id;
SELECT * FROM ExtractData;
SELECT data_type, source FROM ExtractData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM TransformData ORDER BY transform_type DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM ReportDefinition WHERE created_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_data FROM ReportData WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ExtractData WHERE data_type = 'Sales';
SELECT id, source FROM ExtractData WHERE last_extract_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_name, target_table FROM SourceMapping WHERE source_type = 'API';
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM ReportDefinition WHERE created_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT id, report_data FROM ReportData WHERE report_id = 101;
